articles.title: Cricketer Kedar Jadhav's Father Found After Going Missing From Pune Home - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Kedar Jadhav represented India in 73 One-Day Internationals and has been playing for the Maharashtra Ranji team since 2007.
articles.content: Cricketer Kedar Jadhav's father Mahadev Jadhav was found hours after he went missing from their Pune home on Monday, a police official said. As per Kedar Jadhav's complaint at Alankar police station,… [+468 chars]
